articles.description: West Ham stalwart Declan Rice has formed a strong bond with Jordan Henderson while on England duty and claims the Liverpool captain brings vital "intensity" and "leadership" to the Three Lions set-up
articles.content:
West Ham star Declan Rice admits he is regularly amazed by Jordan Henderson's "intensity" - and says he's "praying" the "world-class" Liverpool captain will be available for this summer's Euros.

articles.title: Lionel Messi Text Pep Guardiola After Zlatan Ibrahimovic's Arrival And He Wasn't Happy - SPORTbible
articles.description: The Argentina forward thought the arrival of Zlatan might mean he wasn't as important to the team, especially after some bad performances.
articles.content:
Zlatan Ibrahimovic's time at Barcelona didn't last very long or go too well, but when he first arrived Lionel Messi was so worried about losing his spot it forced him to message Pep Guardiola.

articles.title: Nate Diaz's insult to Leon Edwards backfires as fight is booked for UFC 262 - Mirror Online
articles.description: Diaz last month claimed not not know who the Brit was but will now face him over five rounds on May 15
articles.content:
Nate Diaz has agreed to face Leon Edwards at UFC 262 -a month after claiming he didn't know who the Brit was.
